0:
access_by_lua_block {
  local apiKey = ngx.var.authHeader1
  if apiKey ~= nil then
    local args = ngx.req.get_uri_args()
    args.token = apiKey
    ngx.req.set_uri_args(args)
  end
}

add_header Content-Type application/javascript;
return 200 "self.addEventListener('install', event => { event.waitUntil(self.skipWaiting()) })";

nodeAffinity:
  preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
    - weight: 60
      preference:
        matchExpressions:
          - key: kubernetes.io/arch
            operator: In
            values:
              - amd64
              - i386
              - i686
              - x86

for i in $(seq 1 180); do
  test -f /host/etc/cni/net.d/10-calico.conflist && exit 0
  sleep 1
done
exit 1

while true ; do
  printf "\e[1;32m%-6s\e[m\n" "Fetching metrics ..."
  curl -s 'http://snmp-exporter-sr505n:9116/snmp?module=sr505n_dsl&target=192.168.1.1' | sponge /config/sr505n.prom
  printf "\e[1;32m%-6s\e[m\n" "Fetch complete."
  sleep 300
done
